# {{lb|zh|literary}} [[capital]] [[city]] {{gloss|of a country}}

====Usage notes====
When translating the English term ''capital city'', use {{zh-l|首都}} when referring to the capital of a country, {{zh-l|首府}} when referring to the capital of a state or autonomous region, and {{zh-l|省會}} when referring to the capital of a province. Alternative terms for the capital of a country include {{zh-l|國都}}, {{zh-l|京城}}, {{zh-l|京都}}, {{zh-l|京邑}} and {{zh-l|都城}} all of which are more commonly used in literary language.
